meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jill Locascio Nate Burgan Alex Navissi Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7031.

td.p: Jill Locascio, an academic librarian from Brooklyn, New York
Nate Burgan, a research manager from Oak Park, Michigan
Alex Navissi, a business development associate originally from Katy, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,500)

tr.td: BROADWAY HIT ALIASES
CAN I HAVE A WORD?
TAKE ME TO YOUR LITER
YOU CAN'T SPELL GEOGRAPHY WITHOUT "M"
DEATH OF A VEEP
WEARING BLACK

...

(Elbridge) Gerry

AlexJill
')

tr.td: Alex
Nate
Jill
FRENCH COMPOSERS
PLAYING GOD
OROGENIES
IT'S MY WAY & THE HIGHWAY
GET THE "URGE"
AUTHORS BEFORE & AFTER

tr.td: Alex

Jill

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex Trebek: [To Nate] Kipling was referring to the cable cars, of course.)
NateWhat is San Francisco?
$4,200
AlexWhat is San Francisco?
$3,801
JillWhat is Detroit
$5,801
San Francisco')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Kipling wrote of this city, "If a car" can "run up & down a slit in the ground... why shall I seek the reasons of the miracle?"')

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
Kipling wrote of this city, "If a car" can "run up & down a slit in the ground... why shall I seek the reasons of the miracle?"
Alex
Nate
Jill
2-day champion: $26,901
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Alex
Nate
Jill

17 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)

14 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)
